nodes.description: 喀布尔Al-Taqwa清真寺在周五祈祷期间发生爆炸
nodes.support_text: A bomb exploded in a mosque in the Afghan capital, Kabul, during Friday prayers

nodes.description: 爆炸导致3人死亡（含高级布道者Samiullah Raihan）和20人受伤
nodes.support_text: killing three people including a senior preacher

nodes.description: 爆炸物被放置在清真寺供桌附近
nodes.support_text: explosives were apparently placed near the altar of the Al-Taqwa mosque

nodes.description: 遇袭清真寺位于逊尼派穆斯林为主的社区
nodes.support_text: The neighborhood where the bombing took place is dominated by Sunni Muslims

nodes.description: 爆炸发生时 dozens of men 正在参加集体礼拜
nodes.support_text: The explosion hit at a time when dozens of men had gathered for prayers

nodes.description: 未明确宣称责任的袭击，但塔利班和伊斯兰国被指为惯犯
nodes.support_text: No group has claimed responsibility for the attack

nodes.description: 高级布道者Raihan身份：西方支持政府支持者/阿富汗国民宗教委员会成员
nodes.support_text: He was a supporter of the Western-backed Afghan government which Taliban militants are trying to bring down. He was also a member of the National Ulema Council

edges.support_text: killing three people including a senior preacher
The neighborhood where the bombing took place is dominated by Sunni Muslims
No group has claimed responsibility for the attack
explosives were apparently placed near the altar of the Al-Taqwa mosque
The explosion hit at a time when dozens of men had gathered for prayers
